definitions: having, revealing, or proceeding from a great deal of worldly experience and knowledge of fashion and culture

examples.text: a young man with sophisticated tastes

shortDefinitions: having, revealing, or proceeding from great deal of worldly experience and knowledge of fashion and culture

definitions: appealing to people with worldly knowledge or experience
shortDefinitions: appealing to people with such knowledge or experience

definitions: (of a machine, system, or technique) developed to a high degree of complexity
shortDefinitions: developed to high degree of complexity

definitions: (of a person or their thoughts, reactions, and understanding) aware of and able to interpret complex issues; subtle

examples.text: discussion and reflection are necessary for a sophisticated response to a text

shortDefinitions: aware of and able to interpret complex issues
